title: Start
body:
<<if $seen_sally is 0>>
Player: Hey, Sally.
Sally: Oh! Hey.
Sally: You kind of snuck up on me.
Sally: Don't do that.
<<set $seen_sally to 1>>
<<else>>
Player: Hey.
Sally: Hi.
<<endif>>

<<if not visited("Watch")>>
[[Anything exciting happen on your watch?|Watch]]
<<endif>>
[[See you later.|Exit]]

title: Watch
body:
Sally: No, not really. 
Sally: Same old nebula, doing the same old thing.
Sally: Oh, Ship did want to chat to you. Go say hi to it.
<<if $seen_ship is 1>>
Player: Already done!
Sally: Well, then.
<<endif>>
